verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Amidst the sapphire sky and heavens of gold,
God stares down the earth from above.
He keeps on loosing for devoted and faithful Christians,
who appreciates His sacrifice and cherishes His loves.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He does not search for people with pride in their hearts,
or men with strong and mighty looks on their face,
who brags of their riches or their high marks
of their intelligence and the winnings of their race.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
What use is a man with high worldly ranks
and invests his money on foolishness and waste.
He is stiffnecked and stubborn in the eyes of God,
for he fills his flesh with what satisfies his taste.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
God simply looks for simple and ordinary people,
who treasure his existence and with merciful hearts,
who firmly commit themselves to God's ministry,
to obligate, to pledge, todo their parts.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Firmly committed means no turning back.
Not to be ashamed no matter what storms will pass.
That's the kinds of Christians God is looking for.
Ready to sacrifice to make their commitment last.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
These Christians who have compassion for the lost.
In tribulations they fight, in trials they rise,
they will forever raise the mighty banner:
"FIRMLY COMMITTED TO THE CAUSE OF CHRIST"
